exclusion.criterion: Previous diagnosis of an illness associated with premature ovarian failure (Turner's syndrome, Fragile X permutation carrier) or endocrine disorder associated with irregular menstrual cycles (Cushing's disease, poorly-controlled Thyroid disease, hyperprolactinemia, polycystic ovary syndrome, and congenital adrenal hyperplasia)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous diagnosis of any malignancy or any history of systemic/local chemotherapy, radiation therapy, or stem-cell transplant.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous surgical excision of one ovary or both ovaries
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 32-year-old obese woman with weight concerns, sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape. She has completed the four square step test in 14 seconds.
